TextBody:
Hi Amrut,

You can block websites by using the following steps:

1. Please go to Denylists and Allowlists -> Denylists -> Domain and URL:

2. Add the URL.
3. Add the Domain URL to the CAP Policy Denylist.


Please let me know if this works for you.

Best Regards,
Flaviu Moldovan | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
